import { useState } from 'react' import './Header.scss' import SideBar from '../SideBar/SideBar' import logo from '../../assets/logo.svg' function Header(props) { const [isOpenSide, setIsOpenSide] = useState(false); const showSideBar = () => { setIsOpenSide(!isOpenSide) } document.body.style.overflow = isOpenSide ? 'hidden' : '' return (
) } export default Header
